heading: HB08170
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 6958 CHANGING THE WORD MACTAN APPEARING THEREIN TO LAPU-LAPU REPEALING THE NAME OF THE AUTHORITY FROM MACTAN-CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY (MCIAA) TO LAPU-LAPU - CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY (LCIAA), AND REPEALING CORRESPONDINGLY THE NAME OF THE AIRPORT FROM MACTAN - CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (MCIA) TO LAPU-LAPU - CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (LCIA)
